snippet.title: Truck Loader 2 - Game Walkthrough (full)
snippet.description:
Imagine there's a new machine that can be used to load the cargo quickly. Test the machine and your wits in this simple but challenging puzzle game called Truck Loader 2. The objective in this game is to load the cargo using the truck loader and place them inside the truck. The cargo or crates must fit perfectly in the marked area. Once they placed inside, the truck loader should leave the truck to complete the level. There are also fragile cargo in some levels and you must avoid breaking them. The game also features elevators and buttons that you must use to get the crates.

---
Other "Truck Loader" game sequels:
